title: Random moments of lag with good fps and ping???
body: Since about a week ago my game started to randomly have moments where i cannot control my champ and either get stuck standing still or get forced to watch my champ run straight into people... i've never had this issue until about a week ago, help?

replies.body:
Sounds like you might be suffering from packet loss, which is essentially just some data is getting lost in between you and us. Fortunately we got steps that might be able to stop it!

For starters, if you're not already, use a hard line connection and get off Wifi. It's always gonna be more reliable in connecting you to us and keeping your gameplay smooth. Next, check and make sure that your firewall or AV is not interfering with LoL and blocking communication somehow. [**Follow this link**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) to find directions on what you can try to bypass that!

Try both of those steps and let me know if they help after testing the result by playing a couple Custom Games. :)
